item.title: 4. Conclusion

item.title: 2. Outliers

item.title: 1. Youniverse, a complex dataset
item.description: Data exploration - John is a young data scientist who thoroughly enjoys the Applied Data Analysis course. He also has another passion in life - Youtube.
